title: WB Inject Test Component
description: Runtime JavaScript injection and testing component for DOM elements

target.description: CSS selector for the target element to inject code into

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: CSS selector for the target element

events.name: wb:inject-test:ready
events.description: Fired when component is initialized and ready

events.name: wb:inject-test:executed
events.description: Fired when test code is successfully executed

methods.name: selectTarget
methods.description: Select a target element using CSS selector

methods.name: runTest
methods.description: Execute the JavaScript code on the target element

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clear the code editor and results

methods.name: copyCode
methods.description: Copy the current code to clipboard
